abstract: Britain's Davis Cup tennis team has risen from bottom of Euro-African Zone Group 2 under guidance of team captain Leon Smith and now has chance to win Davis Cup for first time since 1936.
lead_paragraph: Leon Smith had no experience of competing professionally when he was appointed captain of Britain’s Davis Cup team in April 2010. Now he has helped execute one of the most drastic reversals in the competition’s history.

headline.main: Tireless Star and Unorthodox Coach Help Lead Britain to Davis Cup Final
headline.print_headline: Tireless Star and Unorthodox Coach Help Lead Britain to Davis Cup Final

snippet: Leon Smith had no experience of competing professionally when he was appointed captain of Britain’s Davis Cup team in April 2010. Now he has helped execute one of the most drastic reversals in the competition’s history.
